hooks.command: [ "$CLAUDE_CODE_REMOTE" \!= "true" ] && exit 0; command -v gh >/dev/null || { sudo apt-get update >&2 && sudo apt-get install -y gh >&2 || { echo 'Failed to install gh' >&2; exit 1; }; }; [ -d /tmp/claude_ref ] || { git clone --depth 1 https://x-access-token:${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/duquesnay/claude-memories.git /tmp/claude_ref >&2 || { echo 'Failed to clone claude_ref' >&2; exit 1; }; }; /tmp/claude_ref/install.sh --core-only --root $HOME >&2
